name: moxie
caption: Moxie

effect.short: Raises [Attack]{mechanic:attack} one stage upon KOing a Pokémon.
effect.full:
This Pokémon's [Attack]{mechanic:attack} rises one stage upon knocking out another Pokémon, even a friendly Pokémon.

This ability does not take effect when the Pokémon indirectly causes another Pokémon to faint, e.g. through [poison]{mechanic:poison} or []{move:spikes}.

If this Pokémon knocks out a Pokémon with []{ability:mummy}, the former's ability will change without taking effect.

flavorText:
The Pokémon shows moxie, and that boosts the
Attack stat after knocking out any Pokémon.
